OriginalClarification: A functional module loaded into the main GUI
Rectification: 'Plugin' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: A functional module loaded into the main GUI.
'Basic version' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Standard feature set (six plugins).

OriginalClarification: Version with extra features beyond basic
Rectification: 'Enhanced version' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Version with extra features beyond basic.
'Destination folder' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Output directory for generated files.
'Output options' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Filename pattern and prefix variables.
'Compression' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Option to compress output PDF.

OriginalClarification: PDF forms handling option when merging
Rectification: 'Forms' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: PDF forms handling option when merging.

OriginalClarification: Directory used by default for saves/loads
Rectification: 'Default working directory' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Directory used by default for saves/loads.

OriginalClarification: Previously saved environment loaded at startup
Rectification: 'Default environment' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Previously saved environment loaded at startup.
'Working environment' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Full state of GUI/plugins saved/restored.
'Log level' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Granularity of logs to display (OFF/INFO/DEBUG...).

OriginalClarification: Application theme / L&F chosen by user
Rectification: 'Look and feel' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Application theme / L&F chosen by user.
'Memory usage' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Maximum memory (default 254MB).

OriginalClarification: Runs on any OS with a JVM
Rectification: 'Platform independent' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Runs on any OS with a JVM.

OriginalClarification: Response times; system is considered real-time
Rectification: 'Performance Requirements' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Response times; system is considered real-time.

OriginalClarification: No identity management; low security level
Rectification: 'Security Requirements' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: No identity management; low security level.
'Software Quality Attributes' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Pleasant UI; user friendly; accessibility.
'Thumbnails creation library' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Library used to create thumbnails.

OriginalClarification: Whether to include PDF form fields
Rectification: 'Form merging option' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Whether to include PDF form fields.
'Unique filename pattern' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Pattern ensuring unique output filenames.
'Bookmar names sanitization' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Non-file-friendly chars may be stripped.

OriginalClarification: Saved environment to automate recurrent tasks
Rectification: 'Recurrent jobs' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Saved environment to automate recurrent tasks.
'Preview large files' should be described explicitly. Clarify its meaning, scope, and measurable criteria. Example: Ability to preview large PDFs.
